getScript()

jsæ–‡ä»¶è¢«å‘¼å”¤æ—¶æ‰è¢«åŠ è½½ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœæ€§èƒ½ï¼Œä¸”ä¸éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥è¯¥jsæ–‡ä»¶

ajax()

$("input").click(function(){
	$.ajax({
		type:"post",
		url:"text.php",
		data:{word:"xiao"},
		success:function(response,status,xhr){
			$("#box").html(response);
		},
		timeout:3000,
		global:false,
		error:function(xhr,errorText,errorType){
			alert(xhr.status+":"+xhr.statusText);
		}
	});
});

//åºåˆ—åŒ–è¡¨å•
$("form input[type=button]").click(function(){
	$.ajax({
		type:"post",
		url:"text.php",
		data:$("form").serialize(),
		//var json = $(this).serializeArray();	è·å–jsonå½¢å¼
		success:function(response,status,xhr){
			$("#box").html(response);
		}
	});
});

//åˆå§‹åŒ–é‡å¤å±æ€§
	$.ajaxSetup({
		type:"post",
		url:"text.php",
		data:$("form").serialize()
	});

ajaxStart() / ajaxStop()

//è¯·æ±‚åŠ è½½æç¤ºçš„æ˜¾ç¤ºå’Œéšè—
$(",loading").ajaxStart(function(){
	$(this).show();
}).ajaxStop(function(){
	$(this).hide();
});
